ShortDescription.Value: Check how your citizen navigates in your city

Publish.LongDescription:
## Navigation View Click the top-left button to enable.
Select a citizen / car to list routes, stops, means of transport and distance in a side view, resembling the navigation apps in their phone
Recommended to use with the [Cim Route Highlighter](https://mods.paradoxplaza.com/mods/76662/Windows) mod by mattswarthout.
Features: * List roads, paths, public transport routes and stops for your selected citizen * Grouped by means of transport * Configure the refresh frequency
